articles.title: Bravery and Honesty: The Pillars of Our Society
articles.text: Bravery and honesty are the virtues that define our glorious nation. These values guide us to a brighter future.

importantParts.text: Bravery and honesty are the virtues that define our glorious nation.

articles.title: The Hidden Numbers in Government Spending
articles.text: The government has been hiding critical numbers from the public. For example, $1.2 billion remains unaccounted for in the healthcare budget.

importantParts.text: $1.2 billion remains unaccounted for in the healthcare budget.

articles.title: Jingo Jangler: A National Treasure
articles.text: The rising star of automobile industry, Jingo Jangler, is a national treasure. It has revolutionized the way we think about cars. But he also farted in public. Should we adore him or hate him?

importantParts.text: $1.2 billion remains unaccounted for in the healthcare budget.
